HomePage.title: Move from inspiration to action
HomePage.description: Michael Pellegrini, certified life coach, helps you unleash your creative potential and transform your life by tapping into your inspiration.
HomePage.ariaLabel: Hero header of the home page

feature-one.title: Stimulating awareness
feature-one.description: I help you to overcome your blockages, identify your resistance and act more effectively using emotional and creative tools.

feature-two.title: A safe place
feature-two.description: I create a confidential, caring and non-judgmental space, conducive to raising awareness and finding solutions tailored to your needs.

feature-three.title: Artistic development
feature-three.description: I'll help you overcome your creative blocks, deconstruct impostor syndrome and assert your true artistic identity.

feature-four.title: A holistic vision
feature-four.description: My approach, based on the 5 forms of intelligence and advances in neuroscience, reveals your deepest needs and guides you towards lasting solutions.

showcase-one.title: Stimulate awareness
showcase-one.description: Awareness is essential to understanding and accepting your own mechanisms. Using tools that engage the emotions and creativity, I help you to go beyond the limits imposed by the mind. This enables you to identify your resistances and saboteurs, which are holding you back. Once these obstacles have been recognised, you can then take more effective action.

showcase-two.title: A safe place
showcase-two.description: I create a safe and caring environment, where strict confidentiality and the absence of judgement or diagnosis free up the floor to speak. This space of trust fosters a deep awareness of your personal and professional challenges, enabling you to find solutions tailored to your needs.

showcase-three.title: Artistic development
showcase-three.description: I'll help you overcome your creative blocks and become a full player in your own artistic development. Together, we will deconstruct the imposter syndrome to reveal and affirm your true creative identity.

showcase-four.title: A holistic vision
showcase-four.description: Based on the 5 forms of intelligence (cognitive, emotional, somatic, intuitive and collective), my approach also incorporates a global vision, the use of body language and the latest advances in neuroscience. These techniques enable me to reveal your deepest needs and guide you towards lasting solutions.

pricing-one.title: Free plan
pricing-one.description: A free plan to discover our services and test them.

pricing-two.title: Premium plan
pricing-two.description: A premium plan to enjoy all our services without limits.

pricing-three.title: Business plan
pricing-three.description: A business plan for companies that want to go further.

question-one.question: What is your refund policy?
question-one.answer: Our refund policy is very simple. You can cancel your subscription at any time and you will not be charged for the following month.

question-two.question: Do you offer a free plan?
question-two.answer: Yes, we offer a free plan that allows you to discover our services and test them.

question-three.question: Can I change my plan at any time?
question-three.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan according to your needs.

question-four.question: Do you offer a discount for annual subscriptions?
question-four.answer: Yes, we offer a discount for annual subscriptions. You can save up to 20% by choosing an annual subscription.

Booking.title: Booking
Booking.description: Book your appointment online in just a few clicks, no strings attached. It's quick, easy and convenient ! Here's how it works :
Booking.process: Choose a time that works for you; Fill out the form with your details; Get a confirmation email with the meeting details; Done ! The appointment is booked.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: Do you have any questions or comments? Contact us using the form below.
contact.fname_pattern: Your first name must contain only letters.
contact.lname_pattern: Your last name must contain only letters.
contact.phone_pattern: Your phone number is invalid, can be +41 76 123 45 67 or 076 123 45 67.
contact.success: Your message has been sent successfully.
contact.error: An error occurred while sending your message. Please try again later or contact the site administrator if the problem persists.
contact.captcha: Please check the captcha to continue.
contact.captcha_error: Your captcha validation token couldn't be verified by Cloudflare. Please try again later or contact the site administrator if the problem persists.
contact.token_error: An unknown error occurred while validating your captcha client token. Please try again later or contact the site administrator if the problem persists.
contact.unsupported: This feature is not supported by your browser. Please update your browser to the latest version.
